availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward A. Jones (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Mercer County, Kentucky, native. Son of William Jones and Susan Jones. Married to Nancy Jane Warren in Green County, Kentucky, on October 1, 1863. Father of Susan E. Jones and Sarah E. Jones. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 146A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Upper Brush Creek Precinct, p. 508B.
Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954, Genealogical Society of Salt Lake City, Salt Lake City, UT, Green County Marriages, Film 000592665.
